org.asoem.greyfish.core.agent

Class AbstractAgent<A extends Agent<C>,C extends BasicContext<?,A>,AC extends AgentContext<A>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.asoem.greyfish.core.agent.AbstractAgent<A,C,AC>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Agent<C>, AgentNode, org.asoem.greyfish.utils.collect.TreeNode<AgentNode>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSpatialAgent, DefaultBasicAgent

    public abstract class AbstractAgent<A extends Agent<C>,C extends BasicContext<?,A>,AC extends AgentContext<A>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Agent<C>
    This class provides a skeletal implementation of the Agent interface.
